response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire our premier product, valued at $1,000,000 by you. I understand the significant importance this product holds for you and am eager to facilitate its acquisition. I am offering you the chance to own it at a special price of $950,000. This is an exclusive offer tailored to recognize your appreciation and commitment to our product. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
